channel.title: CVE Feed for eglibc -- eglibc

item.title: CVE-2013-4357|2024-08-06T16:38:01.915Z -- eglibc -- eglibc
item.description: The eglibc package before 2.14 incorrectly handled the getaddrinfo() function. An attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service.
